segments.text: The Illusionist is supported by HSBC.
segments.translation: The Illusionist is supported by HSBC.
segments.romanized: The Illusionist is supported by HSBC.

segments.text: Did you know you can get out to $700 when you start banking with HSBC?
segments.translation: Did you know you can get out to $700 when you start banking with HSBC?
segments.romanized: Did you know you can get out to $700 when you start banking with HSBC?

segments.text: Plus you could pay no monthly banking fees, but really you get much much more.
segments.translation: Plus you could pay no monthly banking fees, but really you get much much more.
segments.romanized: Plus you could pay no monthly banking fees, but really you get much much more.

segments.text: Banking with HSBC has many advantages like $0 global wire transfer fees, no interact

segments.romanized: Banking with HSBC has many advantages like $0 global wire transfer fees, no interact

segments.text: e-transfer fees and access to over 3,380 amps all over the country.
segments.translation: e-transfer fees and access to over 3,380 amps all over the country.

segments.text: And also I've noticed that HSBC offers 10 gender neutral titles, not just Mr and Mrs
segments.translation: And also I've noticed that HSBC offers 10 gender neutral titles, not just Mr and Mrs
segments.romanized: And also I've noticed that HSBC offers 10 gender neutral titles, not just Mr and Mrs

segments.text: Which is often all you'll give them in title options.
segments.translation: Which is often all you'll give them in title options.
segments.romanized: Which is often all you'll give them in title options.

segments.text: Visit HSBC.ca slash offers today to get started.
